Roman,
   
  you have to have your group settings set to "individual emails" in order to recieve file attachments, you will recieve every post as an email.
   
  Misty

romanchevalier <romanchevalier@...> wrote:
          Hello Franck,

How can I listen to your files ?

Thanks,
Roman

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> From the Ghostman, recorded directly to the PC. Ask me if I give 
a crap if there's no supporting evidence. All meaningful statements 
to me, except maybe #1. I judge these by content and meaning. 
The "serious" researchers can go join the JREF. 
> 
> Don't get me wrong, it's serious in that we want to improve the 
methods and communication, but it is not so serious that only a 
chosen few can do the work. There's room for every approach!
> 
> Frank-S

with star power.
